mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_room WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND worker_id = #{workerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (room_id, post_id, owner_id, worker_id, created_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{postId}, #{ownerId}, #{workerId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, p.title as postTitle FROM chat_room r JOIN walk_posts p ON r.post_id = p.post_id WHERE r.room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_msg (room_id, sender_id, content, sent_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_msg WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY sent_at ASC

SELECT r.*, p.title AS postTitle, CASE WHEN r.owner_id = #{userId} THEN (SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = r.worker_id) ELSE (SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = r.owner_id) END AS otherPersonName, (SELECT content FROM chat_msg WHERE room_id = r.room_id ORDER BY sent_at DESC LIMIT 1) AS lastMessage, (SELECT sent_at FROM chat_msg WHERE room_id = r.room_id ORDER BY sent_at DESC LIMIT 1) AS lastDate FROM chat_room r JOIN walk_posts p ON r.post_id = p.post_id WHERE r.owner_id = #{userId} OR r.worker_id = #{userId} ORDER BY lastDate DESC NULLS LAST
